rows.label: tlk70000057_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I don't really remember what happened
when we 'scaped from our village.

rows.label: tlk70000057_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Mamma told us to run, so my brother
grabbed my hand and we ran as hard
as we could.

rows.label: tlk70000057_03_msg0003
rows.name:
But it's OK. Mamma ran away to a
different place. My brother said so.

rows.label: tlk70000057_03_msg0004
rows.name:
So we decided to find our da and
wait for Mamma together.

rows.label: tlk70000057_03_msg0005
rows.name: I hope she gets here soon. I miss her.
